messages.msgSnippet: --=-When I was in college I hung out with... (I hanged out with? ) art students and they all had been required to buy a deck of colored cards for some
messages.messageBody:
--=-When I was in college I hung out with... (I hanged out with? <g>)
art students and they all had been required to buy a deck of colored
cards for some horrible amount of money like $36 (probably like $100
in todays gas prices) --=-

That makes me think of a book I bought at the used bookstore, while
I was in High School.
It had 8 color chips. You were to put the color chips in order of
your favorite, best to least.
Then, it had a key which explained your personality or mood based on
the order you picked the colors.
Hours of fun. :)

Nancy



*****
blogging at:
http://happychildhood.homeschooljournal.net




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
